actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor Standards.

official_title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to make certain provisions of section 7 of such Act applicable to Indian tribal governments and their employees.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to make certain provisions, which relate to special exceptions from overtime requirements for fire protection, law enforcement, and other public employees, applicable to Indian tribal governments and their employees.

titles.title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to make certain provisions of section 7 of such Act applicable to Indian tribal governments and their employees.
